## TilingScheme.getWorldBox() method

Returns the bounding box in world coordinates.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getWorldBox(tileKey: TileKey, result?: Box3Like): Box3Like;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tileKey | [TileKey](./harp-geoutils.tilekey.md) | The <code>TileKey</code>. |
|  result | [Box3Like](./harp-geoutils.box3like.md) | The optional object that will contain the resulting bounding box. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Box3Like](./harp-geoutils.box3like.md)
